strokes.description: Sharp angular lines cutting across space, creating tension and dynamic movement
Intersecting diagonal strokes that fragment the composition
Jagged zigzag pattern emphasizing disorder and unpredictability

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing image shows sharp, angular lines with erratic directions and intersections. Building upon this, I chose a 'chaotic' mood to amplify the sense of disorder and tension. Using the pen brush with quick, decisive strokes (speed 1-2) creates clean but aggressive marks that enhance the feeling of instability and dynamic energy. The composition deliberately avoids peaceful horizontal or vertical lines, instead focusing on dramatic diagonals and sharp angles that clash and compete for attention.
